Sincere thanks to the home team, the filmmakers, the uploader, and all involved - including all seeders and leechers. Thank you, TPB, for holding the line against all odds. 

It's inspiring to see people standing up for what's right and righteous, despite an ongoing personal toll, an egregiously ignorant public, and a wealthy class engaged in a perpetual war with the people of the world.

Thank you from the bottom of my heart. Endless respect and eternal solidarity.

BS player 64 bit + windows 7 = no sound. weak.

If you don't have sound use VLC Player.  You should be using this anyways no matter if your on Linux or Windows.   It is the best player that exists.  

Download Official VLC Player here:
http://www.videolan.org/vlc/index.html

If you still have problems (which I doubt you will)  Then you can also download k-lite codex package to install Every Codec, so that you can be sure to play everything in the world on your computer.  

Download K-lite Codec here:
http://codecguide.com/download_kl.htm
